title: A Forever Home
description: A Forever Home is a touching and heartwarming story for all doglovers. It tells the story of Bailey, from her own viewpoint, who begins her life in circumstances beyond her control. She longs for love and to live in home where she will be cared for. This short story follows her adventures from her start and through the trials she faces to reach her Forever Home. This is the first book of a new series that will introduce you to Bailey and each of her friends and how they all find their way home.  I hope you enjoy her journey.
author: Kaleigh Mills
